mapper.select: select (select sum(personal_amount) from `wk_hrm_insurance_month_emp_project_record` b left join `wk_hrm_insurance_month_emp_record` h on b.i_emp_record_id = h.i_emp_record_id where b.type not in (10, 11) and b.i_emp_record_id = #{iEmpRecordId} and h.status = 1) as personal_insurance_amount, (select sum(personal_amount) from `wk_hrm_insurance_month_emp_project_record` c left join `wk_hrm_insurance_month_emp_record` h on c.i_emp_record_id = h.i_emp_record_id where c.i_emp_record_id = #{iEmpRecordId} and h.status = 1 and c.type in (10, 11)) as personal_provident_fund_amount, (select sum(corporate_amount) from `wk_hrm_insurance_month_emp_project_record` b left join `wk_hrm_insurance_month_emp_record` h on b.i_emp_record_id = h.i_emp_record_id where b.i_emp_record_id = #{iEmpRecordId} and h.status = 1 and b.type not in (10, 11)) as corporate_insurance_amount, (select sum(corporate_amount) from `wk_hrm_insurance_month_emp_project_record` c left join `wk_hrm_insurance_month_emp_record` h on c.i_emp_record_id = h.i_emp_record_id where c.i_emp_record_id = #{iEmpRecordId} and h.status = 1 and c.type in (10, 11)) as corporate_provident_fund_amount;
